name: Fried Phoenix
description:
Fried Phoenix is a 2D Bullet Hell game made with Unity. Move the character with WASD and dodge the fireworks to avoid getting fried. Survive the longest to acquire the best score!

===============================================================

Credits:
  • All visuals assets were created by the team during the jam.
  • SFX : All sound effects are from freesound.org
  • Menu music : https://pixabay.com/music/china-world-asian-carnival-china-traditional-music-tra...
  • Game music : Ching Cheng Hanji style instrumental loop by Az on Youtube
